name: Cursed Dream
description:
This game was made for the brackeys game jam . The theme is "Rewind" .I took it literally and made a game in which the character is a teenager boy who woke up in the dream realm and kept seeking the exit and he found out the chocking truth.

Music made By "onlymeith" here is his Link :" http://dig.ccmixter.org/people/onlymeith"
